QuestData.Title: Bring Down the Avalanche
QuestData.Description: Avalanchion stands before you. Slay him to keep Therazane's forces from attacking Stonehearth.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Slay him to prevent the impending attack upon Stonehearth.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done what few others could have. Defeating Avalanchion was no small feat.$B$BI'm impressed, $n. Will you help us with our war against the stone troggs so that we can rescue the Stonefather?
